import { ScrollArea } from "@/components/ui/scroll-area" import { Bell, Activity } from "lucide-react" import { Card } from "@/components/ui/card" interface SidebarProps { position: "left" | "right" } export function Sidebar({ position }: SidebarProps) { const notifications = [ { id: 1, title: "Sistema actualizado", time: "Hace 5 min" }, { id: 2, title: "Alerta de combustible", time: "Hace 10 min" }, { id: 3, title: "Nuevo mensaje", time: "Hace 15 min" }, ] const progress = [ { id: 1, title: "Test de navegación", progress: 75 }, { id: 2, title: "Calibración de sensores", progress: 90 }, { id: 3, title: "Diagnóstico de sistemas", progress: 60 }, ] return (

{position === "left" ? "Notificaciones" : "Progreso"}

{position === "left" ? notifications.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.time}

 )) : progress.map((item) => (

{item.title}

))}
) }
